name: UFGSignInteractWidget
comment: General purpose Sign Designer Interact Widget. Intended to be used across all customizable signs

methods.name: NativeInitSignData
methods.comment: Called after the interact widget is assigned to pull data and establish interface

methods.name: NativePostInit
methods.comment: Called one frame after init to build all sign elements

methods.name: GetViewportScaledVector
methods.comment: Returns a scalar to scale all UI elements by (to set absolute positions correctly)

methods.name: GetWorldScaledVector
methods.comment: Returns a scalar to scale UI elements back to world space

methods.name: GetWorldSignSize
methods.comment: Get the dimensions of the world sign

methods.name: NotifyElementSelected
methods.comment: Called by either the canvas or the layout list to inform that a new element was selected

methods.name: CalculateDPIMatrix
methods.comment: Initialize the viewport DPI matrix for furture vector transforms

methods.name: CalculateScaledCanvasDimensions
methods.comment: Calculates the maximum size possible for our canvas object while maintaining aspect of world sign

properties.name: mElementListWidget
properties.comment:
/
Widget reference that holds a list of all active elements and allows for creation / deletion of sign elements

properties.name: mElementSettingsContainer
properties.comment: Container (Canvas Panel) to add the appropriate settings widget to when an element is selected

properties.name: mCanvasSizeBox
properties.comment: Size box from where we determine the drawing canvases maximum size constraints

properties.name: mCanvasContainer
properties.comment: Panel to hold the FGSignCanvas ( dimensions will never be skewed )

properties.name: mSignCanvasWidget
properties.comment: Custom widget that holds the panel for which actual sign elements are added

properties.name: mElementSettingsWidget
properties.comment: Created at runtime, can be null if no element is selected

properties.name: mSignInterface
properties.comment: Pointer to the interact objects sign interface

properties.name: mDPIScaleMatrix
properties.comment: Matrix of DPI scale to apply to get absolute screen position

properties.name: mInverseDPIScaleMatrix
properties.comment: Matrix to reverse DPI scale when going from screen to world

properties.name: mCanvasToComponentScale
properties.comment: Scale from World Size of sign to our Canvas UI Element
